Experiential Training| Business Acumen Training| CEO/Inventor of e-Factor!® Role-Playing Business Ethics Simulator
July 30, 2014, Marcy worked with Alan but at different companies

If you are a start-up looking for an advisor, do not stop, do not pass Go, choose Alan directly.  Every time I meet with him I get fresh insights, new perspectives, and a wealth of experience and guidance. He has an easy way of seeing core issues and helping people to focus on what is important.  And he makes it safe to explore opportunities and learn from mistakes.Alan has a practical approach to starting businesses and he truly loves helping people be successful. He is also extremely honest and direct - both qualities of utmost important to a great mentor. I'm lucky to call Alan my advisor.

June 25, 2014, Shad was a client of Alan’s

The advice I receive from Alan is always precise, comprehensive and actionable in contrast to other advisors I've encountered who are generally vague and opinionated in comparison.   Alans uncanny ability to research and advise is unparalleled, it's evident that his experiences founding Skymall and his time at Price Waterhouse have conditioned him to advise businesses of any size or stage.

Nima Jacob Nojoumi
Co-Founder & CEO at Sourcely
October 23, 2017, Alan was Nima Jacob’s mentor

I've had the privilege to mentor Nima since early in his co-founding of Sourcely. During that time I've seen Nima recruit and effectively lead a team of talented professionals, elegantly navigate pivots that have led to the company's current high growth, and maintain his poise and perspective amid considerable challenges as Sourcely found its way in the businessworld and to its customers. Nima has displayed all that one would hope to see from an entrepreneur--passion, coachability, tenacity, commitment, tireless effort, transparency, honesty, a willingness and ability to tackle tough situations and conversations, imagination, persuasiveness, professionalism, and humility. I could not be prouder of the businessperson Nima has grown to become nor prouder to give him my highest recommendation as an entrepreneur to follow, to support financially and otherwise, and to believe in. Nima will break through walls to see Sourcely succeed and, perhaps just as importantly, credit his team and investors for that success. An outstanding person and a supremely impressive entrepreneur who I am proud to know and mentor.

Julia Teryokhina
Senior Solution Visionary at Softeq Development
October 24, 2016, Alan was a client of Julia’s

I had the pleasure of having Julia lead the team of software developers for an angel-backed venture in which I was involved that required building a complex, custom consumer-facing application involving several programming languages, integrations, and use cases. We'd speak via Skype every week, and I found Julia to be technically superior, business minded, patient (which I definitely required since I'm not steeped in programming), and wholly dedicated to producing the product I sought to achieve. She was tireless in her work ethic and worked diligently to ensure I wasn't confronted with any surprises. I have great respect for Julia's talents and professionalism, and recommend her without hesitation or reservation.
